name: Battle Gear 3
summary: The long awaited sequel to Battle Gear 2 is here! Get ready for the fight of your life! Battle Gear 3 takes the familiar formula from Battle Gear 2 and improves upon it by adding more units, more strategy, and a greater diversity of upgrades! The whole point of the game is to conquer the world one country at a time by carefully managing your troops! There are tons of upgrades and leveling up to do! How far can you get in this exciting strategy game? Good luck!
